subject: Football

lead_paragraph: The new “league year” is expected to begin Thursday at 4 p.m.; newly signed free agents cannot practice before the collective bargaining agreement is ratified.
snippet: The new “league year” is expected to begin Thursday at 4 p.m.; newly signed free agents cannot practice before the collective bargaining agreement is ratified.
